title: English 8 Unit 8 - Present Simple for Future
subject: English 8

questions.question: My art lesson ______ at one o'clock.
We ______ a meeting tomorrow morning at 8.
Hurry up! The show ______ in 10 minutes.
The plane takes off at 10 a.m. This sentence expresses:
options: A fixed schedule in the future
questions.answer: A fixed schedule in the future

questions.question: I usually ______ up early, but tomorrow I ______ the train at 7 a.m.
Choose the INCORRECT sentence.
options: The train leaves at 5 p.m. tomorrow.
I am always busy on Mondays.
Look at the clouds! It rains soon.
questions.answer: Look at the clouds! It rains soon.

questions.question: Reorder the sentence: 'beach / go / the / to / Sometimes, / we / weekend / the / on'.
options: Sometimes, we go to the beach on the weekend.
We sometimes go to the beach on the weekend.
We go to the beach on the weekend sometimes.
Sometimes, we to the beach go on the weekend.
questions.answer: Sometimes, we go to the beach on the weekend.
